utils.access.op

Interface Condition

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AlternativeFieldAccess, AndCondition, CompareCaseInsensitive, CompareCondition, ElemMatchCondition, EqualsSingleValueCondition, ExistsCondition, FieldAccess, InCondition, OrCondition

    public interface Condition
    Condition in a mongo query

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object asMongoQuery()
      Converts the condition to a mongo query that works on a standard collection
      Condition indexExpression()
      Convert this expression into an index operation.
      Condition indexValueExpression()
      Convert this expression into a value to be applied to an index.
      boolean isInBounds(java.lang.Object low, java.lang.Object high)
      Returns if this condition may be true when applied to values in the given range.
      Condition optimize()
      returns an optimized version of the condition
      boolean satisfiedBy(java.lang.Object obj)
      returns true if the provided object satisfies this condition

    • Method Detail

      • satisfiedBy

        boolean satisfiedBy(java.lang.Object obj)
        returns true if the provided object satisfies this condition
        Parameters:
        obj - part of record to be checked
        Returns:
        true if the condition is satisfied

      • optimize

        Condition optimize()
        returns an optimized version of the condition
        Returns:
        optimized version of condition (may be same object)

      • indexValueExpression

        Condition indexValueExpression()
        Convert this expression into a value to be applied to an index. Returns null if conversion is not possible.
        Returns:

      • indexExpression

        Condition indexExpression()
        Convert this expression into an index operation. Returns null if conversion is not possible.
        Returns:

      • asMongoQuery

        java.lang.Object asMongoQuery()
        Converts the condition to a mongo query that works on a standard collection
        Returns:
        object to be passed as properties to the mongo query

      • isInBounds

        boolean isInBounds(java.lang.Object low,
                   java.lang.Object high)
        Returns if this condition may be true when applied to values in the given range. This is used by the index engine.
        Parameters:
        low - low value to test
        high - high value to test
        Returns:
        true if condition may be satisfied by values inside the given bounds.
